name: audiobook-app
description: This is a separate project for the mobile audiobook app.

scripts.setup: npm run prepare-www && npm run add-platform
scripts.add-platform: node -e "const cp=require('child_process');try{cp.execSync('npx cap add android',{stdio:'inherit'})}catch(e){console.log('Android platform already exists')}" && npx cap sync
scripts.build:android: npx cap sync && npx cap open android
